description: Travel advice and information during Tube strikes

texts: Check before you travel and plan ahead using our travel tools. Keep up-to-date with the latest service information. See:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["This web page, which will be regularly updated","TfL Twitter accounts, including \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/TfLTravelAlerts\"\u003e@TfLTravelAlerts\u003c/a\u003e , \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/bakerlooline\"\u003e@bakerlooline\u003c/a\u003e , \u003ca href=\"http://www.twitter.com/piccadillyline\"\u003e@TfLBusAlerts\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"http://twitter.com/tfltrafficnews\"\u003e@TfLTrafficNews\u003c/a\u003e as well as the \u003ca href=\"http://m.me/tfltravelbot\"\u003eTfL Travelbot\u003c/a\u003e on Facebook Messenger"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/plan-a-journey/\"\u003ePlan a journey\u003c/a\u003e , which can help you plan your route by public transport, cycling or walking","Check the latest \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/index\"\u003estatus updates\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps?Input=Current+location+\"\u003eNearby\u003c/a\u003e , whichÂ uses your current location or a postcode or address of your choice and places you on a map, showing you Tube, bus, river, London Overground, DLR, TfL Rail and Santander Cycles locations around you","Our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/travel-information/social-media-and-email-updates/email-updates\"\u003eemail updates\u003c/a\u003e "]}
